segments.text: Looking at this scene, the kitchen seems ordinary at first.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a neat garden, all calm and green.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman stands facing the sink area, towel in hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's polishing a plate, expression blank.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Suddenly, I realize the sink is overflowing badly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water pours over the edge in a steady stream.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle spreading on the floor, reaching her shoe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Near the open cabinet, a boy on a stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's tilting back, hand in the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A girl beside him, arm raised for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're cooperating quietly, away from the woman's view.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks ready to give way.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked nearby, could crash if he falls.
segments.speaker: PAR
